New Records: Shohei Ohtani stole his 56th base of the season
Fernando Tatis Jr. hit the longest home run by a Padre this season at 448 feet
Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani singled in the go-ahead run in the sixth inning
Michael Kopech walked Jake Cronenworth with two outs in the ninth inning
Brandon Lockridge stole second base in the ninth inning
Donovan Solano struck out swinging on a 101-mph fastball to end the game
Alex Vesia got the win, while Jeremiah Estrada suffered the loss
Fernando Tatis Jr. hit a 448-foot home run to tie the game in the fifth inning
Pre-Game Insights: The Dodgers need a win in Thursday’s series finale to earn their 11th division title in 12 years
Both teams have already clinched postseason berths
Joe Musgrove has thrown six scoreless innings in three of his four outings this month
Walker Buehler is still looking for his second win of the regular season
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Mike Shildt said, 'We’re playing for the division, it’s a little bit out of our hands as far as the destiny goes (but) we still have a shot at it, for sure'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Dodgers increased their lead over the second-place Padres to three games with four to play
The Padres’ five-game winning streak ended
